rows.label: bf11520100_0010
rows.name: How long have you been with Adel?

rows.label: bf11520100_0020
rows.name:
About three years, I think.
And about one year with Hikari.

rows.label: bf11520100_0030
rows.name:
My village was washed away in a flood.
Adel-sama saved us.

rows.label: bf11520100_0040
rows.name: Oh, so it wasn't because of the war.

rows.label: bf11520100_0050
rows.name: It was the same thing.

rows.label: bf11520100_0060
rows.name:
They were short on supplies, so they clear-cut
the mountain, and that caused a flood.

rows.label: bf11520100_0070
rows.name: Nee-chan?

rows.label: bf11520100_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11520100_0090
rows.name:
You were searching for your mom, right?
Did you get separated in the war?

rows.label: bf11520100_0100
rows.name: If only it were that simple...

rows.label: bf11520100_0110
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf11520100_0120
rows.name: My family situation was... complicated.

rows.label: bf11520100_0130
rows.name: Complicated...?

rows.label: bf11520100_0140
rows.name: Mhm...

rows.label: bf11520100_0150
rows.name: Oh...

rows.label: bf11520100_0160
rows.name: My mother was hired help.

rows.label: bf11520100_0170
rows.name:
When I was about ten, she was working as a maid.
That's when I met Shin.

rows.label: bf11520100_0180
rows.name: You were a Driver at 10?

rows.label: bf11520100_0190
rows.name: Yeah. Things got bloody.

rows.label: bf11520100_0200
rows.name:
I ran from the house... and next thing I knew,
17 years had gone by.

rows.label: bf11520100_0210
rows.name: You don't look 27. I would've guessed you were 20.

rows.label: bf11520100_0220
rows.name: Heh, this kid knows how to say the right things.

rows.label: bf11520100_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehehe.

rows.label: bf11520100_0240
rows.name: Then you're just like me and Sata.

rows.label: bf11520100_0250
rows.name: Yeah. There are a lot of kids like that these days.

rows.label: bf11520100_0260
rows.name:
That's why I want to be there for them,
just like how Shin was always there for me.

rows.label: bf11520100_0270
rows.name: Even if we're not a real family.

rows.label: bf11520100_0275
rows.name: Right, Satahiko?

rows.label: bf11520100_0290
rows.name:
Oh, come on, no reaction?
That kinda hurts, you know.

rows.label: bf11520100_0300
rows.name: It's fine. He's happy, I can tell.

rows.label: bf11520100_0310
rows.name: Really? You can tell?

rows.label: bf11520100_0320
rows.name: Kinda.

rows.label: bf11520100_0330
rows.name: I see. Okay! I'm feeling fired up now!

rows.label: bf11520100_0340
rows.name:
Let's hurry up and bring peace to this world,
so we can all live together.

rows.label: bf11520100_0350
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: bf11520100_0360
rows.name: You should join in.

rows.label: bf11520100_0370
rows.name: Me?

rows.label: bf11520100_0380
rows.name:
You don't have to force yourself just
because you're a Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf11520100_0390
rows.name: It's not like I'm forcing myself...

rows.label: bf11520100_0400
rows.name: I think you should just be yourself.

rows.label: bf11520100_0410
rows.name: [ML:undisp ][ML:Dash ]
